author: nem
install_msg: This cog uses Discord threads to simulate auctions. Use `[p]help auction` to get started.
name: ServerAuctions
description:
Simulates auctions using Discord threads.
Actions can be created by an auctioneer or the bot owner.
`[p]auction contract` to make someone an auctioneer.
You can also use Red's bank for managing auction funds.
`[p]auction togglebank` to enable or disable Red's bank, By default, the bank is not used and any user can bid any amount.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data except for user ids to track auctions
